content:
NavigatingCancelEventHandler Delegate

Definition

Represents the method that will handle Navigating events.

In this Article

public delegate void NavigatingCancelEventHandler(object sender, NavigatingCancelEventArgs e);
Inheritance
Object
Delegate
NavigatingCancelEventHandler

Remarks

This event handler is used for the following events:

  • System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating
  • System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigating
  • System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigating
  • System.Windows.Application.Navigating
